data.name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE MOVIE DLC COSTUME PACK
data.detailed_description:
Exclusive content coming from the new Dragon Ball Z movie Dragon Ball Z Resurrection ‘F’:
  • Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku's costume
  • Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Vegeta's costume
  • Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku's wig
data.about_the_game:
Exclusive content coming from the new Dragon Ball Z movie Dragon Ball Z Resurrection ‘F’:
  • Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku's costume
  • Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Vegeta's costume
  • Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku's wig
data.short_description: Exclusive content coming from the new Dragon Ball Z movie Dragon Ball Z Resurrection ‘F’:Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku's costumeSuper Saiyan God Super Saiyan Vegeta's costume Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku's wig
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (x64) / Windows 7 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5200+, 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Nvidia GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista (x64) / Windows 7 (x64) / Windows 8 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5200+, 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Nvidia GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
